Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Relates to providing for the return of any identification materials to an individual upon release from custody
Summary: Provides for the return of any identification materials to an individual upon release from custody.
LawCode: Amd ยง125, Cor L; add ยง837-w, Exec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law and the executive law, in relation to providing for the return of any identification materials to an individual upon release from custody ;.us on;
